word: IT WAS REMARKABLE THAT IN HER READING AND SCANNING OF BOOKS THAT HER MIND WAS DIRECTED TO THE MOST HELPFUL BOOKS AND TO THE MOST HELPFUL PASSAGES CONTAINED IN THOSE BOOKS. OCCASIONALLY SHE WOULD MENTION TO FATHER, AND IN MY PRESENCE, HER EXPERIENCE IN BEING LED TO EXAMINE A BOOK WHICH SHE HAD NEVER LOOKED INTO BEFORE, AND HER EXPERIENCE IN OPENING IT TO CERTAIN PASSAGES THAT HELPED HER IN DESCRIBING THAT WHICH SHE HAD SEEN AND WISHED TO PRESENT.
